title: Some Devs Turn to TanStack After Remix/React Router Merger
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Meta-framework Remix merged React Router v7 in November, prompting some developers to abandon the framework for TanStack.
cntitle: 一些开发者在 Remix/React Router 合并后转向 TanStack
cndescription: Meta-framework Remix 在 11 月合并了 React Router v7，这促使一些开发人员放弃该框架，转而使用 TanStack。
